CustomField.description: Calculated by taking the sum of each MEDPICC Score field and giving it a total. Economic Buyer, Champion and Identified Pain are worth 1.65 points, opposed to the others only being worth 1 point.
CustomField.formula: (VALUE(TEXT( Champion_Score__c ))*1.65) + VALUE(TEXT( Competition_Score__c )) + VALUE(TEXT( Decision_Criteria_Score__c )) + VALUE(TEXT( Decision_Process_Score__c )) + (VALUE(TEXT( Economic_Buyer_Score__c ))*1.65) + (VALUE(TEXT( Identified_Pain_Score__c ))*1.65) + VALUE(TEXT( Metrics_Score__c )) + VALUE(TEXT( Paper_Process_Score__c ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated by taking the sum of each MEDPICC Score field and giving it a total. Economic Buyer, Champion and Identified Pain are worth 1.65 points, opposed to the others only being worth 1 point.
CustomField.label: MEDDPICC Total
